duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify and recommend products and services (Credit Cards, CD's IRA's, Loans) that will help members reach their financial goals.
Service members on the teller line with monetary transactions, account maintenance, ownership changes, wire requests, IRA transactions, automatic transfers, disputes and serve as notary public.
Strategically build and optimize referral network and pipeline in order to meet or exceed monthly performance metrics through outbound calls, community outreach, and networking.
